code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{searchNASAImages}from'../api/search';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NasaImageSearch=()=>{const[query,setQuery]=useState('');const[results,setResults]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleSearch=async()=>{if(!query)return;try{setLoading(true);const data=await searchNASAImages(query);setResults(data);}catch(err){console.error("Search failed",err);}setLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container bg-dark p-4 rounded mb-7",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-white",children:"\uD83D\uDD0D NASA Image Search"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row g-2 my-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-9",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control bg-white text-black border-secondary",placeholder:"Search for a planet, galaxy...",value:query,onChange:e=>setQuery(e.target.value)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-3 d-grid",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSearch,className:"btn btn-outline-light",children:"Search"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."}),results.map((item,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-sm-6 col-md-4 mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card bg-secondary text-white h-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.imageUrl,className:"card-img-top img-fluid",alt:"..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text small",children:item.description})]})]})},idx))]}),!loading&&results.length===0&&query&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No results found."})]});};export default NasaImageSearch;
